attributes.action: STOP Inverclyde council raising council tax once again to line their own pockets
attributes.additional_details:
One of the most impoverished area in Inverclyde and yet the council continue to take from people’s
Pockets to line their own pockets with corrupt council leader.
attributes.background: Stop Inverclyde from raising council tax once again, it was raised last year by 8% however the council had the utter audacity to the give their councillors an 8 % pay increase which is utterly deplorable.

rejection.details: This is a local issue that doesn't fall under the responsibility of the UK Government of or Parliament, so I am afraid we can't accept it. You may wish to petition the Scottish Parliament instead.
